label: All We Need is Love
description: All we need is love! We have all the bases of love covered in this February display. Check out our love-ly books, music, movie selections on display that have love in the title!

list.label: Art & love : an illustrated anthology of love poetry
Love as a way of life : seven keys to transforming every aspect of your life
Love for no reason : 7 steps to creating a life of unconditional love
Love illuminated : exploring life's most mystifying subject (with the help of 50,000 strangers)
The love of a good woman
Only love is real : a story of soulmates reunited
